prompt.text: You're in the middle of an important security meeting with your counterpart. Listen to what he says and choose the best response.

native.text: ووبخی، خو اوس زما د مانځه وخت دیږ

ezread.text: wobakhay, kho oss zema de manza wakht dey.

translation.text: Excuse me, but it's time for me to pray.

feedback.text: Religious responsibilities can take precedence over official ones. It's important to respect this practice.
Remember, religious responsibilities can take precedence over official ones. It's inappropriate to hold up your counterpart in this situation.

translation.text: I understand, I'll finish up quickly so you can pray.

feedback.text: Remember, religious responsibilities can take precedence over official ones. It's important to be patient. Your counterpart will return after prayer.

translation.text: No problem. How long do you think you'll be gone?

feedback.text: Remember, religious responsibilities can take precedence over official ones. It's inappropriate to hold up your counterpart in this situation.

translation.text: Can we finish up here before you go?
